name: SE Lithuanian airports
membership: SE Lithuanian airports is a member of ACI EUROPE organisation.
goal:
Lithuanian Airports is a state enterprise which unites and manages Vilnius, Kaunas and Palanga airports, develops the activities of the three airports in a coordinated manner, offers a wide range of services, as well as high standards of the quality of service rendered to passengers and partners.

MISSION
Our mission - to unite different Lithuanian airports, to promote sustainable partnership and new business development, to ensure different high quality experience for passengers and to contribute to the development of national economy.
VISION
Our vision is to become the most popular airport network for passengers and partners in the region.
STRATEGIC GOALS:
Equal quality of services provided
Efficiently managed environment through service development
Financial stability and consistent growth of the airport network
Mutual value between company and employee

VALUES:
Responsibility
Unity
Enthusiasm
innovation
interests: Climate Action, Enlargement, Environment, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
SE Lithuanian airports has interest in
TEN-T network regulation development and its changes
New and revised transport infrastructure policies;
Policies on EU funding and regulations.
